info.name: BIM360 Automation
info.description:
A collection to document the Forge APIs used to automate tasks in BIM360 Docs.

It also defines the bearer token that will be passed to subsequent API requests to Forge.

item.name: Authentication
Two Legged

request.description: Endpoint used to request a bearer token

item.description: A folder to store all endpoints used for two-legged oAuth flows.

item.name: Three Legged
item.description: A folder to store all endpoints used for two-legged oAuth flows.
A folder to stores all the endpoints that pertain to authentication with the Forge platform.

request.description:
Initiate a download of a file.

We are passing into the request additional custom headers xrefs and xref_index. These will be read by the Newman script to determine filenames of the downloaded linked files.

item.description:
Collection of endpoints needed to successfully download a published Revit model with linked files from BIM360 Docs.

The download object is a compressed archive that contains all the Revit model files.
